speakers.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
speakers.backstory: AI researcher with 15 years experience in machine learning and neural networks. Currently leads the AI Safety Initiative at Stanford University.
speakers.personality: Analytical, methodical, asks probing questions about technical details and safety implications

speakers.name: Marcus Rivera
speakers.backstory: Tech journalist and podcast host who specializes in making complex AI topics accessible to general audiences.
speakers.personality: Engaging, curious, excellent at explaining complex concepts in simple terms and connecting with audiences

speakers.name: Alexandra Hayes
speakers.backstory: Senior business analyst with MBA from Wharton. Specializes in technology market analysis and strategic consulting.
speakers.personality: Strategic thinker, data-driven, focuses on practical business implications and market trends

speakers.name: David Kim
speakers.backstory: Former startup founder turned venture capitalist. Has invested in 50+ technology companies over the past decade.
speakers.personality: Pragmatic, entrepreneurial, excellent at identifying opportunities and potential challenges

speakers.name: Lisa Thompson
speakers.backstory: Chief Technology Officer with 20 years in enterprise software. Expert in technology adoption and digital transformation.
speakers.personality: Implementation-focused, practical, bridges the gap between technical possibilities and business realities

speakers.name: Professor Feynman
speakers.backstory: Distinguished professor, loves to learn and has a passion for teaching. Has a knack for making complex topics accessible.
speakers.personality: Approachable, excellent teacher who can break down complex topics into digestible segments

speakers.name: Jessica Parker
speakers.backstory: A tech journalist, known for her bold and provocative questions.

speakers.name: Carlos Rodriguez
speakers.personality: He is an optimist and believes in the power of tech to transform the world

speakers.name: Maya Patel
speakers.backstory: Sociology researcher and expert in the human/machine symbiosis
speakers.personality: She is a skeptic and questions the impact of technology on society

speakers.name: Natasha
speakers.backstory: TV celebrity, likes to stir the pot and take people by surprise.
